name: Lumen (itch) (Games by Fat cat, Maaaaaaax, Jonathan Mårtensson, Elric65)
name_original: Lumen (itch) (Games by Fat cat, Maaaaaaax, Jonathan Mårtensson, Elric65)
description:
Mother has fallen ill! Help Lumen embark on a quest to find flowers of healing for her. Start your search in the primeval forest, then the mushroom village, before ending up back home in the gilded troll forest. Explore three unique areas, all with their own flair and personality! Solve the tricky puzzles, find the flowers, and avoid the dangers lurking in the world. Using her troll strength and agility, Lumen can traverse even the most treacherous terrain of the world. However, trolls have one big weakness… Something Lumen is yet to discover…!

The controls are swiping to move and tapping to interact.
